Description:
Detects the PowerShell command lines with special characters

Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea), Vasiliy Burov (rule), oscd.community, Tim Shelton (fp)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential PowerShell Command Line Obfuscation
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((((process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe') and (original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll')) and (command re '\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+' and command re '\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{' and command re '\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^' and command re '`.*`.*`.*`.*`')) and  not ((command like '%new eventsource("microsoft.windows.sense.client.management"%' or command like '%public static extern bool installelamcertificateinfo(safefilehandle handle);%') or parent_process_path = 'c:\program files\amazon\ssm\ssm-document-worker.exe'))
